articles.title: Trump's Legal Drama Intensifies Amid Presidential Immunity Debate
articles.description: Donald Trump's lawyers argue that Manhattan prosecutors improperly used evidence from Trump's official acts to secure his conviction on hush money charges. The court's decision impacts other cases Trump faces, including charges related to the 2020 election and mishandling classified documents.
